Name: Duck Race
About the game: Duck Race is the latest in Twitch viewer interaction! Invite your viewers to enter the race as an adorable rubber duck, and kit them out with a variety of skins and accessories. Let them loose across a number of rivers and environments, and cheer as they race to be the first over the waterfall! Key Features Full Twitch.tv chat integration !quack to join the race Customise with a number of skins to choose from Add additional flare with over 25 hats and accessories Custom Duck names - escape the restrictions of username326 Early Response '“Duck Race is super-cute. My viewers love their tiny rubber ducks in funny hats, and I love how fun they look when they go over a waterfall.” - John Robbertson (The Dark Room) 'Duckrace is one of the best and easiest community, chill games out there. Rubber duck racing? HECK YEAH' - MEOwTiNgZ 'Let's just say Duck Race moved me... TO A BIGGER HOUSE! (Oops, I said the quiet part loud and the loud part quiet.) No but seriously, Duck Race is super fun and really easy to explain to new viewers, instant conversational starter.' - THRILLHOO Controls Mostly intuitive controls, but with a little nuance: Click ducks on the home screen to set player skin options Click left mouse to take/release control of the camera Mouse to turn camera WASD to move camera - Shift speeds you up Numbers 1-9 for set camera locations Space to move UP, Left Ctrl to move DOWN M to mute music +/- to increase/decrease camera movement speed Q to show/hide names
